column1: * Túrin returns to Dor-lómin and discovers that Morwen and Nienor had left for Doriath. In a rage
column2: Túrin kills Brodda the Easterlings. Aerin dies in the fire in Broddas hall.

column3: comes to the Brethil and discovers that Finduilas had been killed by orcs. He stays in Brethil and takes the name Turambar.

column1: * Mablung leads a party from Doriath to Nargothrond; it is waylaid by Glaurung and Niënor and Morwen Eledhwen are lost in the wild..
* Niënor falls under Glaurungs spell and forgets her identity. She is found by Túrin and comes to Brethil.
